name: Logo gallery
help: This component allows you to display a gallery of images, they can be logos from brands that you sell on your store, companies partnership, featured products or whatever you want to communicate with images.

columns_desktop.name: Number of columns on desktop
columns_desktop.help: Choose how many logos will be displayed by row on desktop version.

autoplay_speed.name: Autoplay speed
autoplay_speed.help: Time that takes to pass from one 'Block' to the next, in seconds.

enable_arrows.name: Enable arrows
enable_arrows.help: Displays 'next' and 'previous' arrows for customers to navigate.

enable_dots.name: Enable dots
enable_dots.help: Displays navigational dots (points) for customers to navigate.

highlight_color.name: Highlight color
highlight_color.help: This color is for the highlighted line.
